name: Minimalistic site generator using json and jade
tagline: A minimal CMS style solution for generating static HTML pages from JSON data using Jade and Harp
body:
# Minimalistic site generator using json data
A CMS style solution for generating static HTML pages from JSON data using Jade as a templating engine and Harp server for jade compilation and site generation.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
